title: my league wont open
body:
I opened my lol and it wont work. every time I open it, it says it is not designed to run on windows or it contains an error
pls somebody help me!!!!!!

replies.body: Is your Windows OS set to 32 bit or 64 on Windows 10?  You may need to[ update your OS](https://www.windowscentral.com/how-upgrade-32-bit-64-bit-version-windows-10), then run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is being allowed to launch without any blocks.  Let me know if that helps.
